dct_description_sm: drawn by the Geographic Division, C.O.I.
Shows "Native states" and "British India" and the location of areas relating to the Hindu, Mohammedan, Sikh, and Buddhist religions.
In upper right border area: Free.
Includes table of "Percentages of State populations professing Hindu and Mohammedan faiths."
dct_creator_sm: United States, Office of Coordinator of Information., Geographic Division.
